6 class ReflexionFieldsTrait {
7 
8  abstract public static function getAnnotationMember($class, $member, $annotation);
9 
15  protected static function getAnnotationColumnMember($class, $member){
16  return self::getAnnotationMember($class, $member, "@column");
17  }
18 
19  public static function getDbType($class, $member) {
20  $ret=self::getAnnotationColumnMember($class, $member);
21  if (!$ret)
22  return false;
23  else
24  return $ret->dbType;
25  }
26 
27  public static function isSerializable($class, $member) {
28  if (self::getAnnotationMember($class, $member, "@transient") !== false || self::getAnnotationMember($class, $member, "@manyToOne") !== false || self::getAnnotationMember($class, $member, "@manyToMany") !== false || self::getAnnotationMember($class, $member, "@oneToMany") !== false)
29  return false;
30  else
31  return true;
32  }
33 
34  public static function getFieldName($class, $member) {
35  $ret=self::getAnnotationColumnMember($class, $member);
36  if ($ret === false || !isset($ret->name))
37  $ret=$member;
38  else
39  $ret=$ret->name;
40  return $ret;
41  }
42 
43  public static function isNullable($class, $member) {
44  $ret=self::getAnnotationColumnMember($class, $member);
45  if (!$ret)
46  return false;
47  else
48  return $ret->nullable;
49  }
50 
51  public static function getProperties($instance) {
52  if (\is_string($instance)) {
53  $instance=new $instance();
54  }
55  $reflect=new \ReflectionClass($instance);
56  return $reflect->getProperties();
57  }
58 
59  public static function getProperty($instance, $member) {
60  $reflect=new \ReflectionClass($instance);
61  $prop=false;
62  if($reflect->hasProperty($member)){
63  $prop=$reflect->getProperty($member);
64  }
65  return $prop;
66  }
67 
68  public static function getPropertyType($class,$property){
69  return self::getMetadata($class, $property, "@var", "type");
70  }
71 
72  public static function getMetadata($class,$property, $type, $name){
73  $a = Annotations::ofProperty($class, $property, $type);
74  if (!count($a)){
75  return false;
76  }
77  return trim($a[0]->$name,";");
78  }
79 }
